items.sentence: Mary is the most beautiful girl I\'ve ever met.
Mary isn\'t as beautiful as her younger sister.
Tom always seems to be doing something illegal.
Tom always seems to be unhappy about something.
Tom and Mary are having lunch in the cafeteria.
I wish I had a little more time to finish this.
I wish I had known about this when I was a kid.
I wish I had someone to tell all my secrets to.
I wonder what Tom\'s motive for doing that was.
It\'s been three weeks since Tom broke his arm.
I can\'t say I\'m terribly proud of what I did.
I arrived home just as my parents were leaving.
I bake two or three loaves of bread every week.
I bought the black bike instead of the red one.
Tom didn\'t buy everything we asked him to buy.
Tom didn\'t care anymore what happened to Mary.
I\'ve searched everywhere but I can\'t find it.
If you don\'t feel like doing it, don\'t do it.
Tom lied to his parents about where he\'d been.
Do you want to go get a cup of coffee and talk?
I really don\'t want anything to eat right now.
When was the last time that you had a headache?
When was the last time you played a board game?
Where were you the night that Tom was murdered?
Can\'t you see I\'m in the middle of something?
Tom is getting used to the way things are here.
Tom is going to pay you a visit this afternoon.
I don\'t want to live too near to where I work.
It won\'t be long before your dream comes true.
Why doesn\'t Tom ever do what I tell him to do?
I wish I could express myself better in French.
I wish I could play tennis as well as Tom does.
I wish I could speak French as fluently as you.
I wish I could still swim as well as I used to.
Whenever Tom comes to Boston, he stays with us.
Where do you go when you need time to yourself?
Where do you think Tom is going to be tomorrow?
Where was Tom going and why was he going there?
I\'ll take care of your dog while you\'re away.
I\'m afraid I won\'t finish the report on time.
I hope Tom enjoys singing as much as Mary does.
I hope that Tom likes the cake I baked for him.
I need to get out of the house for a few hours.
Tom had his chauffeur drive him to the theater.
Tom had no chance to tell Mary what he thought.
Tom had no idea that Mary was going to be here.
Tom had no intention of ever seeing Mary again.
Tom had a little trouble finding Mary\'s house.
It looked like Tom had a lot on his mind today.
It looks as though Tom is waiting for somebody.
